flavor_text_entries.ruby:
AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its
own territory. It mercilessly beats up
anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its
territory at all times.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
AGGRON is surprisingly protective
of its environment. If its mountain
is ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this POKéMON will haul topsoil to the area,
plant trees, and beautifully restore its
own territory.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Its iron horns grow longer a little at
a time. They are used to determine the
AGGRON’s age. The gouges in its armor are
worn with pride as mementos from battles.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It claims a large mountain as its sole
territory. It mercilessly thrashes those
that violate its space.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
It claims a large mountain as its sole
territory. It mercilessly thrashes those
that violate its space.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
While seeking iron for food, it
digs tunnels by breaking through
bedrock with its steel horns.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
While seeking iron for food, it
digs tunnels by breaking through
bedrock with its steel horns.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
While seeking iron for food, it
digs tunnels by breaking through
bedrock with its steel horns.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
You can tell its age by the length
of its iron horns. It claims an
entire mountain as its territory.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
You can tell its age by the length
of its iron horns. It claims an
entire mountain as its territory.
flavor_text_entries.black:
While seeking iron for food, it
digs tunnels by breaking through
bedrock with its steel horns.
flavor_text_entries.white:
While seeking iron for food, it
digs tunnels by breaking through
bedrock with its steel horns.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It claims an entire mountain as its own.
The more wounds it has, the more it has
battled, so don’t take it lightly.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It claims an entire mountain as its own.
The more wounds it has, the more it has
battled, so don’t take it lightly.
flavor_text_entries.x:
It claims an entire mountain as its own.
The more wounds it has, the more it has battled,
so don’t take it lightly.
flavor_text_entries.y:
While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by
breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Aggron claims an entire mountain as its own territory.
It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment.
This Pokémon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Aggron is protective of its environment. If its mountain is
ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this Pokémon will haul
topsoil to the area, plant trees, and beautifully restore its
own territory.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Aggron has a horn sharp enough to perforate
thick iron sheets. It brings down its opponents by
ramming into them horn first.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet
meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He
was trying to channel the Pokémon’s strength.
